title: 服务器玩家一直崩
author: 清之凯
txt_content:
logged in with entity id [808] in plotworld (minecraft:overworld/5) at (12.565692778598159, 65.0, 14.200841100217811).

[11:23:57] [Server thread/INFO] [minecraft/NetHandlerPlayServer]: xiaolongxia lost connection: Internal Exception: java.io.IOException: 远程主机强迫关闭了一个现有的连接。昨天就很正常什么事都没有,我尝试换了ip也没用
